unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for building a strong talent pipeline. IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad continue to provide excellent candidates. Companies like TCS and Infosys heavily invest in these programs. This year's focus should be on aligning skills with future industry needs. Remember the "3 Idiots" philosophy: pursue excellence, and success will follow. Careful planning, including logistics like accommodation and transport (think 100 km radius), is vital. Proper onboarding, including a traditional welcome ceremony, should also be planned. It will definitely give a great head start to the candidates.
